messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3192
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/27/03 5:50:55 PM Eastern Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/27/03 5:50:55 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I'd even forge notes to try and get into the library during class
time. Good lord, who ever does THAT? >>

I had one permit, signed by a teacher, and I would just erase and rewrite the
top part for whatever time I wanted to go to the library. After a few
months, the librarian told me I should probably get a new one to replace my
worn and tattered one <g>.

(back to lurking)
Laura
